Translations.Text: shapath hai aakaash tatha raat mein "prakaash pradaan karane vaale" kee
aur tum kya jaano ki vah "raat mein prakaash pradaan karane vaala" kya hai
vah jyotimay sitaara hai
pratyek praanee par ek rakshak hai
insaan, ye to vichaar kare ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
uchhalate paanee (veery) se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peeth tatha seene ke panjaron ke madhs se nikalata hai
nishchay vah, use lautaane kee shakti rakhata hai
jis din man ke bhed parakhe jaayenge
to use na koee bal hoga aur na usaka koee sahaayak
shapath hai aakaash kee, jo barasata hai
tatha phatane vaalee dharatee kee
vaastav mein, ye (quraan) do-took nirnay (faisala) karane vaala hai
hansee kee baat nahin
vah chaal baazee karate hain
main bhee chaal baazee kar raha hoon
atah, kaafiron ko kuchh thoda avasar de do
apane sarvochch prabhu ke naam kee pavitrata ka smaran karo
jisane paida kiya aur theek-theek banaaya
aur jisane anumaan lagaakar nirdhaarit kiya, phir seedhee raah dikhaayee
aur jisane chaara upajaaya
phir use (sukha kar) kooda bana diya
(he nabee!) ham tumhen aisa padhaayenge ki bhoologe nahin
parantu, jise allaah chaahe. nishchay hee vah sabhee khulee tatha chhipee baaton ko jaanata hai
aur ham tumhen saral maarg ka saahas denge
to aap dharm kee shiksha dete rahen. agar shiksha laabhadaayak ho
darane vaala hee shiksha grahan karega
aur durbhaagy usase door rahega
jo bheeshan agni mein jaayega
phir usamen na marega, na jeevit rahega
vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apana shudhdikaran kiya
tatha apane paalanahaar ke naam ka smaran kiya aur namaaz padhee
